name: Bet Match
description:
"Bet Match is a mobile soccer game in a casino style that you can play with your eyes closed". 

With only a coin button you can play with  luck and bet the destiny of a gerative soccer game. The aim of the game is to grab memories from old radio soccer transmissions and brings it to another interactive level.

   FLIP  the coin and let destiny decide the match.

With only one button and audio orientation the game is also made to be acessible for people with low sight and low mobility.

*COMING SOON*                                                                                                                                                               
                                        *Different options of narrators
                                       *New and fresh design for better UI experience                                                                         *New slots based on your favorite teams

The aim is to port the game to home assistants such as ALEXA so you can play soccer with your voice. 

This prototype is a submission to the Game Jam Plus 2022                                                     |
Team: Natalia Petrutes and her future Dream Team
Category: #prodmadness   *WARNING* The currently prototype is not working. There's a lot of bugs to fix. Soon it will be working perfectly.
